author: Rosie
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog, if you run into any issues or have any questions, you can find me in the Red servers or DM me @blizzthewolf. You are also free to open an issue on [my repository](https://git.purplepanda.cc/blizz/blizz-cogs). Use `[p]mentioned` to view your last mentions!
name: MentionTracker
short: The MentionTracker cog tracks and displays the last 5 mentions a user has received, including the content, author, and timestamp of each mention.
description: The MentionTracker cog tracks and displays the last 5 mentions a user has received, including the content, author, and timestamp of each mention. Useful for when you get pinged while asleep!
